fact_check.title: Open TIF files in document library - social.technet.microsoft.com
fact_check.snippet: In write-protected mode it opens in Microsoft Office Document imaging (MODI) but in the edit-mode it opens in Paint. Of course MODI ist the better tool to edit TIF files. Now I want to open the file in edit ‚Ä¶
fact_check.social_media_perspective: Reddit (20 posts in r/delhi, NewDelhi, unitedstatesofindia): MIXED
fact_check.explanation:
The claim that "Modi is dead" is a false claim. The search results include a PTI Fact Check article specifically addressing and debunking a social media post making this false claim. Other articles show PM Modi commenting on other events, indicating he is alive. The absence of any credible news sources reporting his death, combined with the presence of a fact-check debunking the claim, strongly suggests it is a hoax. A death of a major world leader would generate widespread coverage.\n\nüê¶ Social Media Perspective: Reddit (20 posts in r/delhi, NewDelhi, unitedstatesofindia): MIXED

‚úì High confidence based on multiple authoritative sources.
